data.title: NBCUniversal
data.meta_description: NBCUniversal Media, LLC is an American mass media and entertainment conglomerate corporation owned by Comcast and headquartered at 30 Rockefeller Plaza in Midtown Manhattan, New York City, United States. NBCUniversal is primarily involved in the media and entertainment industry. The company is...
